title: [Client] is shit...
body: For the past few patches I have tried all of the troubleshooting options you have available as well as just deleting and reinstalling League. But it still does NOT fix the problem of the client disappearing after clicking on the launch button. Extremely frustrating when I come home from work to play a fast game then spend another 30 min or more just trying to fix this shit.

replies.body: The client not appearing after hitting launch could be due to a corruption with the patcher itself.  For your specific issue, I  recommend going through the options provided in our [Patching Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to help resolve this.  If your issue persists, [reach out to player support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can help you out further.  You deserve to unwind after a long day at work, and I hope we can help get this fixed up asap for you!

I'm having the same problem. If I uninstall the update "KB3172985" everything is fine but then windows updates itself and the problem is back.
any solution?
